  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.optaplanner.core.config.solver.SolverConfig.buildSolver()
    Use SolverFactory.buildSolver() or SolverConfig.buildSolver(SolverConfigContext) instead.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.solver.SolverConfig.buildSolver(ClassLoader)
    Use SolverFactory.buildSolver() or SolverConfig.buildSolver(SolverConfigContext) instead.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.getKieBase()
    Use ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.getKsessionName() instead.
